meta.name: description
meta.content: View the 2020 directory of the top 4242 schools public schools throughout Illinois. Find rankings, test scores, reviews and more.

span.title: item which has been noted, verified.

div.div: Illinois is the #5 largest school system in the United States, serving 1,992,313 students across the 4,242 public schools for the 2020 school year.

span.title: item which has been noted, verified.

div.div: Illinois public schools have a diversity score of 0.68, which is lower than the national average of 0.68.

span.title: item which has been noted, verified.

div.div: The most diverse school district in Illinois is East Maine 63 School District. Read more about public school diversity statistics in Illinois or national school diversity statistics.

span.title: item which has been noted, verified.

div.div: There are 204 Blue Ribbon Schools, 148 magnet schools, 142 charter schools and 113 special education schools.

span.title: item which has been noted, verified.

div.div: Minority enrollment is 52% (majority majority Hispanic) and the student:teacher ratio is 15:1.

img.alt: This chart display the percentage breakdown of public school students of all ethnic groups in IL.
img.title: This chart display the percentage breakdown of public school students of all ethnic groups in IL.

span.title: item which has been noted, verified.

div.div: Popular cities: Chicago (659 schools), Aurora (54 schools), Rockford (51 schools), Naperville (48 schools), Peoria (47 schools).

a.title: Detroit Public Schools Lay Off Thousands of Teachers

img.alt: Detroit Public Schools Lay Off Thousands of Teachers
img.title: Detroit Public Schools Lay Off Thousands of Teachers

div.a: Detroit Public Schools Lay Off Thousands of Teachers

div.div: Recent news out of Detroit finds that thousands of teachers and school staff have been notified they will have to reapply for their jobs for the next school year. What does this mean for students and the district?

a.title: Tips to Maintain Your Childs Education During School Closures

img.alt: Tips to Maintain Your Childs Education During School Closures
img.title: Tips to Maintain Your Childs Education During School Closures

div.a: Tips to Maintain Your Childs Education During School Closures

div.div: Schools all over the country have closed their doors to slow the spread of COVID-19, forcing educators and parents to switch to online learning strategies. Read on to learn where to start with homeschooling and for helpful resources for learning at home.

a.title: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools

img.alt: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools
img.title: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools

div.a: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools

div.div: As schools around the country close for two weeks or more, parents find themselves asking some tough questions. Read on to learn about the current and future impact of COVID-19 on students in public schools.
